name: Goodbye & Good Riddance
description: Juice WRLD's debut album, Goodbye & Good Riddance, is a 2018 project exploring themes of heartbreak, drug use, and the emotional struggles of young adulthood. The album features 15 tracks, including the hit singles "All Girls Are the Same", "Lucid Dreams", and "Lean Wit Me". It's noted for its raw, confessional lyrics and its exploration of complex emotions, with critics highlighting its relatability and impact, particularly on the emo rap scene.
